name: quadGT
short_description: quadGT is a software package for the joint genotyping of two parents, child’s normal genome and child’s tumor genome based on sequencing reads aligned to a reference genome.
summary: Software package for the joint genotyping

topic.fullpath: Topic :: Software Development :: Algorithms :: Genetic Algorithms
